name: Extreme Power
overview: Extreme Power is a 3d action game that is sort of the predecessor of the Armored Core game series for Playstation. In the game the player controls a 3d mecha and got to fight other mechas in different futuristic battle arenas. The gameplay is about destroy all the enemies in each stage using the normal or special weapons that the mecha have, the game is divided into 12 stages that takes place in places around the world like deserts, ruins, etc
